main.commandNotFound: That's not a command that I understand, sorry!
main.insufficientPermission: You don't permission to do that
main.missingRole: You need the `%s` role to execute that command

parser.missingQuote: You're missing a quotation mark so I can't understand what you mean!
parser.parameterizedBeforeStandalone: Option `%(option)` requires parameter and cannot be before `%(flag)`

help.description: Mystia helps you with a command or lists all of them!
help.wikiExplanation: More information can be found on the wiki!
help.title: Mystia's Commands

avatar.description: Mystia fetches yours or someone else's profile picture!
avatar.noMentionedUsers: Of whom did you want me to find the avatar of? Please @mention them!

setref.description: Sets a reference channel to print all following calls to this command to. Passing "none" will remove the current reference channel

to.description: Print to the specified channel, ignoring the set reference channel

pick.description: Mystia will help you pick something!

card.description: Pick a card from a standard 52-card deck

ranged.description: Pick from a numeric range instead. Requires two numeric inputs
ranged.nonNumericLimit: At least one limit is not an integer!

pick.insufficientOptions: You must give me at least two options to pick from!

locale.description: List available locales or set your server's locale

set.localeUnavailable: Error: Specified locale is unavailable. Try running `~locale list`

devreload.description: Reloads the command registry. Does not update changes to library or lang files.

join.description: Mystia will join your voice channel
join.noVoiceChannel: You're not in a voice channel right now!

add.description: Add a song to the music queue and begin playing it if the queue is empty
add.insufficientArgs: Please give me the YouTube link to a song to play!
add.invalidURL: Please check the URL you gave me is a valid one, thanks~
add.lostConnection: I lost connection and could not recover, so the music queue was cleared

secret.description: Adds a song secretly to the queue

leave.description: Mystia will leave her voice channel, if she is in one. This will also erase the music queue.

playing.description: Prints the currently playing song, if there is one
playing.secret: The currently playing song was added secretly~

detailed.description: Print extra metadata. Same as calling "songinfo 1"

songinfo.description: Print extra metadata about the song at `index` in the music queue
songinfo.invalidIndex: Please provide the index of the song you want information about
songinfo.indexOutOfBounds: The index you gave me isn't in the queue

skip.description: Skips the current song in the queue, if something is playing

shuffle.description: Shuffles the music queue. Note that index 1 cannot be shuffled because it is the currently playing song

skipto.description: Skip the queue to the specified index. Note that you cannot skip to the current song since it is already playing
skipto.invalidIndex: Please provide the index of the song you want information about
skipto.indexOutOfBounds: The index you gave me isn't in the queue
skipto.cannotSkipCurrentSong: I can't skip to the currently playing song because it's already playing! If you want to skip it entirely run ~skip

qremove.description: Remove the song at the specified index from the queue. `~qremove 1` has the same effect as `~skip`
qremove.invalidIndex: Please provide the index of the song to remove
qremove.indexOutOfBounds: The index you gave me isn't in the queue

pause.description: Pauses music playback while keeping all songs in the queue

play.description: Resumes music playback if the queue was paused. To add a song for playback use `~add`

kick.description: Kicks all the mentioned users from the server.
kick.noUsersMentioned: Please mention the users you want to kick!
kick.DMExplanation:
I'm sorry but you were kicked from the `%(name)` server!
Reason: %(reason)

reason.description: Provides a reason for kicking the users

silent.description: Kick users without messaging them or notifying the channel

ban.description: Bans all the mentioned users from the server.
ban.noUsersMentioned: Please mention the users you want to ban!
ban.DMExplanation:
I'm sorry but you were banned from the `%(name)` server!
Reason: %(reason)
ban.invalidNumberOfDays: The number of days to delete messages from the banned user you gave me is invalid

reason.description: Provides a reason for banning the users

silent.description: Bans users without messaging them or notifying the channel

days.description: Number of days of messages to delete

unban.userNotFound: I couldn't find the user to unban, try using the server management window
unban.multipleUsersFound: Multiple users were found with that name, try providing a discriminator or using the server management window

vccontrol.description: Mute, deafen, move, or disconnect members and roles from a voice channel. Can only disconnect one member at a time. If a member has no voice channel, the command will have no effect. This command can affect other moderators.
vccontrol.unrecognizedCommand: Unrecognized subcommand. Please use `~help vcc` to find available subcommands.
vccontrol.channelNotFound: Could not find a voice channel with the name `%s`.
vccontrol.multipleChannelsFound: Found multiple voice channels with the name `%s`. You cannot which one to move to without renaming it.
